page.title: 11 Moving into Lichfield
page.content: We asked everyone in school where their parents were born and we discovered a strange thing. Only eleven children had parents who were born in Lichfield. Where had all of the other parents come from and why? Most came from towns and villages near Lichfield and others from towns in the Midlands. A small number came from Southern England, Wales and Scotland. Families have also moved from India, Hong Kong and Cyprus. Most parents have moved because their work is here, or is easily reached with transport. The family from India came to get better qualifications and the families from Hong Kong and Cyprus have opened restaurants and fish and chip shops. We are glad that all of the people moved in with their children. We would have been a small school with only eleven pupils.
